GSD.description:
dm raid: fix address sanitizer warning in raid_status

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit cb583ca6125ac64c98e9d65128e95ebb5be7d322. For more details please see the references link.
